isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - 3300 Model - FANS AND ENGINE ACCESSORIES - FAN WIRING - INTERNATIONAL ENGINES - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: When the key is on, the fan clutch is supplied battery voltage at connector (6406) through closed contacts of the de-energized fan relay (4002) from a 5 amp fuse in the engine compartment power distribution center and powered the through closed contacts of the energized primary ignition relay (4003).

The engine controller will supply a ground to energize fan relay (4002) opening the contacts of the fan relay (4002), removing power from connector (6406) to de-energize the clutch, turning off the fan.
